text: Ultraman (stylized as ULTRAMAN) is a manga written by Eiichi Shimizu and drawn by Tomohiro Shimoguchi of Linebarrels of Iron fame. Published in Monthly Hero's since the magazine's inaugural issue, it is a manga sequel of the 1966 Ultraman television series. The series has been collected in 21 volumes as of February 2025. A 3DCG anime adaptation co-produced by Production I.G and Sola Digital Arts is scheduled for release in 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:2015 manga Category:Production I.G
title: Ultraman (manga)
